# bookman

bookman is a non-webapp, standalone bookmark managing software. It gives you the ability to store any link you want and open it instantly.


## Dependencies

* Python 3
* Python 3 - GTK3
* Python 3 - Yaml
* Python 3 - SQL Alchemy


## Building for Debian

```bash
make debian
```
